##    Causal Design 



```{r}
dag  <- dagify(MMrates ~ laws,
               MMrates ~ GDP,
               MMrates ~ literacy,
               laws ~ GDP,
               laws~literacy
               )
ggdag(dag) +  theme_dag_blank()
```
